评论详情: Matches perfectly, just as I was hoping, with other jewelry I recently got. Definitely will be a new top favorite pair of earrings that I will wear often.  The weight is rather light. I’d say it’s definitely a great value for what it was worth because the artistic and stylish quality is just *chefs kiss*. The variety in the length difference is really cute. However, I am unsure how they’ll hold out in sturdiness (and how they’ll effect my ears since I have rather sensitive ears and allergies) since I’ve only just got them. Will try to update in future.

I ordered a set of Y2K Star Earrings for a secret Santa gift and what arrived was two chains in a small zip lock bag. The label on the bag says that it's the earrings but it was slapped on top of the original label.  Very disappointed. Don't buy this jewellery because it's a scam!
